Furthermore, what they have loved and delighted in for a long time, hatred destroys and loses. This is a present suffering aggregate, because of desire, due to desire, and with desire as the dominant factor. This is the cause and condition of desire.

Because of desire, due to desire, and with desire as the dominant factor, because of desire, a mother quarrels with her son, a son quarrels with his mother, a father quarrels with his son, a son quarrels with his father, a brother quarrels with his sister, and a sister quarrels with her brother.

They quarrel together, with the mother saying the son is wrong and the son saying the mother is wrong, with the father saying the son is wrong and the son saying the father is wrong, with the elder brother saying the younger brother is wrong and the younger brother saying the elder brother is wrong, let alone between people.
This is the present suffering aggregate, because of desire, due to desire, with desire as the dominant condition.

Because of desire, due to desire, with desire as the dominant condition, sentient beings quarrel with kings, brahmins quarrel with brahmins, householders quarrel with householders, and low-caste workers quarrel with low-caste workers, each fighting with various weapons.
With fists, stones, knives, or sticks, they die in the midst of this suffering, this is the present suffering aggregate, because of desire, due to desire, with desire as the dominant condition.

Because of this sentient being's lust, up to because of excessive lust, they put on armor and take up bows and arrows, or put on leather armor and hold extremely sharp swords, and surround each other to fight.

In this, they may fight with elephants, horses, chariots, infantry, women, or men. In this, some may die or suffer death. This is the present suffering aggregate, because of lust, because of lusting, because of excessive lust.
Because of this sentient being's lust, up to because of excessive lust, they put on armor and hold extremely sharp swords, and go to a high city to attack it.

This then becomes remorse. Having remorse at the end is also unwholesome, and being born is also unwholesome. This is a present painful aggregate, which arises due to desire and increases due to desire.

This sentient being, due to lust, up to because of excessive lust, performs bodily, verbal, and mental painful practices. This is their bodily painful aggregate, due to lust, up to because of excessive lust. This is called the destruction of lust.
